items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.
items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.
items.title: YashRajput09/BlogBreez: A lightweight, responsive blog platform designed for seamless content sharing and an enjoyable reading experience. Featuring a sleek UI, dynamic post management, and easy customization, BlogBreeze is perfect for bloggers who want to create and manage their content effortlessly.

items.content_html: Lightweight, simple library for handling dates without the complexities of timezones, time components, or some of the more subtle aspects of date manipulation.
items.title: xurei/plain-date-js: Lightweight, simple library for handling dates without the complexities of timezones, time components, or some of the more subtle aspects of date manipulation.

items.content_html: A lightweight inversion of control framework for JavaScript and TypeScript
items.title: mscharley/dot: A lightweight inversion of control framework for JavaScript and TypeScript

items.content_html: A lightweight utility to convert strings into URL-friendly slugs, with support for removing Vietnamese diacritics and handling special characters.
items.title: vnodesign/slugify: A lightweight utility to convert strings into URL-friendly slugs, with support for removing Vietnamese diacritics and handling special characters.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.
items.title: sveltia/sveltia-cms: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free. Made with Svelte.

items.title: keplersj/create-lite-jest-runner: A lightweight Jest runner creator

items.content_html: This project is about UI test automation of the Jira Clone application. The Jira Clone is a lightweight ReactJS application that copies functionalities from the popular Jira task management system.
items.title: MadAphrodite/Jira_Clone_Front-End_Automation: This project is about UI test automation of the Jira Clone application. The Jira Clone is a lightweight ReactJS application that copies functionalities from the popular Jira task management system.

items.content_html: HNSW Lite is a lightweight and fast of the HNSW algorithm for approximate nearest-neighbor search. This repository provides an easy-to-use npm package for JavaScript and TypeScript developers.
items.title: darshandesai1095/hnsw_lite: HNSW Lite is a lightweight and fast of the HNSW algorithm for approximate nearest-neighbor search. This repository provides an easy-to-use npm package for JavaScript and TypeScript developers.

items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.title: jburrow/monaco-editor-code-review: Lightweight extension for monaco-editor to allow commenting off code.

items.content_html: RustyTodo is a high-performance, lightweight todo management application built with Rust for the backend and Nextjs for the frontend. It offers seamless task management with features like adding, editing, searching, and deleting todos, all powered by the robustness and speed of Rust.
items.title: lawalstacks/RustyTodo: RustyTodo is a high-performance, lightweight todo management application built with Rust for the backend and Nextjs for the frontend. It offers seamless task management with features like adding, editing, searching, and deleting todos, all powered by the robustness and speed of Rust.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
